page.title: 17DARTMOUTH: A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My name is{Loretta.}I am 12 years old and I live at 30 Churchfields. It's{Monday}morning. I wake at 8 with the alarm, then change and have cereal for breakfast. I leave for school at 8.35 and meet my friends at the top of the estate by the{'No Entry'}sign. At school I meet my best friend{Jennie}who lives in Brixham. Our day at school is very busy with lessons in English, Humanities, Maths (my favourite), and French (ahhh!). Jennie is staying the night so we walk home together exhausted. After tea we go to{"Good News Club" followed by{Youth Club}where we sing, and are learning to play the guitar. Later my Dad takes us to{Dartmouth {Castle}at the mouth of the river. I think Dartmouth is a pretty place.
